title: Pytorch build fails on Ubuntu 14.04
body_html:
OS: Ubuntu 14.04
Python version: 3.6
Cuda version: v8
CuDNN version: v6
CMAKE version: 3.6

When I try to build Pytorch, I get the following error and compilation fails:

torch/csrc/cuda/Module.cpp:9:18: fatal error: nccl.h: No such file or directory
#include <nccl.h>

More of the log can be seen in the attached file
log.txt

Please let me know where I am going wrong.

body:
OS: Ubuntu 14.04
Python version: 3.6
Cuda version: v8
CuDNN version: v6
CMAKE version: 3.6

When I try to build Pytorch, I get the following error and compilation fails:

> torch/csrc/cuda/Module.cpp:9:18: fatal error: nccl.h: No such file or directory
>  #include <nccl.h>

More of the log can be seen in the attached file
[log.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1147066/log.txt)

Please let me know where I am going wrong.
